_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Updated: Feb 6, 2026

"Champagne" powder in Ontario? Yes, you read that right! With the Georgian Bay frozen over, we're getting rare Western interior powder instead of our usual lake effect snow.

Our Ops Team breaks down why this snow feels so different, and also includes an insider view into how we renovate our trails. Get the full scoop in our Operations Update on the blog.

Watch  Renovating Snow 101 at Blue Mountain
